SEARCH

Interface PackageInterface

All Superinterfaces:
TravelPackage
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddActivity, AddDestination, AddPassenger, DestinationPresent, EnrollPassenger, GetPassenger, ParentPackage, Passenger_optOut, PrintActivityDetails, PrintAvailableActivities, PrintIteneary, PrintPassenger_package, PrintPassengerList
public interface PackageInterface extends TravelPackage
The PackageInterface interface extends the TravelPackage interface and provides methods to manage packages including adding passengers, activities, destinations, enrolling passengers in activities, and printing itinerary details.

  • Method Details

    • add_passenger

      void add_passenger(Package p, String name, int number, String membership, int init_balance)
      Adds a new passenger to the package with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      p - The package to which the passenger will be added.
      name - The name of the passenger.
      number - The number of the passenger.
      membership - The membership status of the passenger.
      init_balance - The initial balance of the passenger.

    • add_Activity

      boolean add_Activity(Package p, String name, int code, String description, String destination, double cost, int capacity)
      Adds a new activity to the package with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      p - The package to which the activity will be added.
      name - The name of the activity.
      code - The code of the activity.
      description - The description of the activity.
      destination - The destination of the activity.
      cost - The cost of the activity.
      capacity - The capacity of the activity.
      Returns:
      true if activity succesfully added else false

    • add_Destination

      void add_Destination(Package p, String name)
      Adds a new destination to the package with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      p - The package to which the destination will be added.
      name - The name of the destination.

    • enroll_passanger

      void enroll_passanger(Package p, String person_name, int passenger_number, String activity_name, int activity_code)
      Enrolls a passenger in the specified activity within the package.
      Parameters:
      p - The package in which the enrollment will occur.
      person_name - The name of the passenger to enroll.
      passenger_number - The number of the passenger to enroll.
      activity_name - The name of the activity to enroll in.
      activity_code - The code of the activity to enroll in.

    • print_iteneary

      void print_iteneary(Package p)
      Prints the itinerary of the package, including destinations and activities.
      Parameters:
      p - The package whose itinerary will be printed.

    • print_passanger_details

      Parameters:
      p - The package containing the passenger.
      name - The name of the passenger.
      number - The number of the passenger.

      name - The name of the activity.
      code - The code of the activity.

    • passanger_topup

      void passanger_topup(Package p, String name, int number, double amount)
      Adds funds to the balance of a specified passenger within the package.
      Parameters:
      p - The package containing the passenger.
      name - The name of the passenger.
      number - The number of the passenger.
      amount - The amount to add to the passenger's balance.

    • passanger_optOut

      void passanger_optOut(Package p, String passanger_name, int passanger_number, String activity_name, int activity_code)
      Removes a passenger from an activity within the package.
      Parameters:
      p - The package containing the passenger and activity.
      passanger_name - The name of the passenger to opt out.
      passanger_number - The number of the passenger to opt out.
      activity_name - The name of the activity to opt out from.
      activity_code - The code of the activity to opt out from.

    • destination_present

      boolean destination_present(Package p, String dest)
      Checks if a specified destination is present within the package.
      Parameters:
      p - The package to check.
      dest - The name of the destination to check.
      Returns:
      True if the destination is present, otherwise false.

    • passenger_details

      Passenger passenger_details(Package p, String name, int number)
      Retrieves details of a specific passenger within the package.
      Parameters:
      p - The package containing the passenger.
      name - The name of the passenger.
      number - The number of the passenger.
      Returns:
      The Passenger object with the specified name and number.
